name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tickld Go To Top Of Post

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creates a new hyperlink at the bottom right hand corner of every post that takes you to the top of that post

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is the alternative extension for Tickld Vote Mover, 

This extension places a "Go to top of post" hyperlink in the bottom right hand corner of every Tickld post. 

This method prevents the issues of overlapping vote and report buttons and also provides quick access to any of the details that the user wants to access like quick commenting.

This second extension is a thank-you to the commenters and upvoters on my post.
